![](mountain.jpeg)

# 目的

RとPythonでグラフ作成をします。

# ヒストグラム

## R

### データの読み込み


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
dgr01<-tibble(value=c(2,2,3,3,3,4,4,5,5,6,6,6,7,7,7,7,7,8,8,8))
```
:::


### グラフ化


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(dgr01,aes(value))+
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## Python

### データの読み込み


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
dgp01=[2,2,3,3,3,4,4,5,5,6,6,6,7,7,7,7,7,8,8,8]
counts,bins=np.histogram(dgp01,
bins=int(max(dgp01)-min(dgp01)+1),
range=(min(dgp01)-0.5,max(dgp01)+0.5))
```
:::


### グラフ化


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
plt.stairs(counts,bins,fill=True)
plt.show()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
